sentences.english: The Russian Defense Ministry dismissed claims of the airport bombing as disinformation .
sentences.chinese: 俄國防部指出關於轟炸機場的消息並不屬實。

sentences.english: The project involves extensive cooperation with the Netherlands MoD’s C2 Support Centre.
sentences.chinese: 該計劃還包括與荷蘭國防部C2支持中心的廣泛協作。

sentences.english: Deputy Secretary of Defense Lynn gave a speech on this issue just yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 國防部副部長林恩就在昨天圍繞這個問題發表了講話。

sentences.english: And what's best is for Don Rumsfeld to remain as the Secretary of Defense,"-- Washington, April 18, 2006
sentences.chinese: 現在的‘最好’就是讓拉姆斯菲爾德續任國防部長。

sentences.english: Indian Defense Minister Arackaparambil Kurian Antony says that has ramifications on this side of the border.
sentences.chinese: 印度國防部長安東尼說，這些鎮壓對印度也有影響。

sentences.english: The Defense Message System provides worldwide electronic message service to U. S. DoD users.
sentences.chinese: 該系統爲美國國防部用戶提供全球電子信息服務。

sentences.english: The Swedish Defense is investing in communications security.

sentences.english: North Korea has test-fired five missiles, South Korea's defence ministry has said.

sentences.english: At that point, the U.S. objected, because the Dept. of Defense said not to destroy it.
sentences.chinese: 在這點上，美國反對，因爲國防部說不能銷燬它。

sentences.english: The Defense Administry said the attacks office was destroyed, at least 42 people injured.
